rules_text: When Sinew Render enters the battlefield, mill four cards, then you may return a creature card from among the milled cards to your hand.[i] [i](Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)[/i][/i]
flavor_text: [i]“A body is a bitter thing, prone to failure at any time. Best to keep a backup.”[/i]
notes: disabled RT for weird spacing between "four" and "cards"
